content.question: Use the passage to answer all parts of the question. In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe one argument the author makes regarding the revolutions discussed in the passage. b) Identify one piece of evidence not found in the source that would support the author’s claim regarding representative government. c) Explain one limitation of de Staël’s view of the French Revolution.

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
